name: O_VS_X
description:
A classical/Elegant/Simple Tic-Tac-Toe  game made for housani69 game-jam.

I brute-forced the Ai even thought i would liked to use minimax algorithm but i didn't have enough time.

Download the Main.rar file and play the game ! Also sorry for not having a WebGl build , Hence i couldnt download the package ;/

Hope evreyone enjoy this game , it was a great experience.

Credits:

background music from https://freemusicarchive.org/music/CIRCUSMARCUS
